name: Town Square
description: A hub of local governance or public administration; adventurers may seek permits, records, or appeal to authorities.
atmosphere: The square has a vibrant, communal atmosphere with the sound of public gatherings and the scent of street food and the rustle of community activities. The air carries the promise of civic engagement and the essential nature of public space, while the atmosphere crackles with the energy of community connection and the excitement of shared experiences and local events.
